lyrics.text:
In the singing, in the silence,
in the hands expectant open,
in the blessing, in the breaking,
in the Presence at this table,

Jesus Christ, Jesus Christ,
be the wine of grace:
Jesus Christ, Jesus Christ,
be the bread of peace.

In the question, in the answer,
in the moment of acceptance,
in the heart's cry, in the healing,
in the circle of your people,

Jesus Christ, Jesus Christ,
be the wine of grace:
Jesus Christ, Jesus Christ,
be the bread of peace.

在歌唱中, 在静默中, 伸雙手 正迫切期待, 祝譵餅杯, 犧牲擘開, 主於聖桌親自臨在,
Zai gechang zhong, zai jingmo zhong, shen shuangshou zheng poqie qidai, zhu dui bing bei, xisheng bai kai, Zhu yu sheng zhuo qinzi lin zai,

主耶稣, 主基督, 做我救恩聖杯: 主耶稣, 主基督, 世界和平聖餅.
Zhu Yesu, Zhu Jidu, zuo wo jiu en sheng bei: Zhu Yesu, Zhu Jidu, shijie heping sheng bing.

在疑惑中, 在答案中, 相接納, 互安慰時刻, 療傷醫治, 悲傷哭泣, 或在主內温馨團契,
Zai yihuo zhong, zai daan zhong, xiang jiena, hu anwei shike, liaoshang yizhi, beishang kuqi, huo zai Zhu nei wenxin tuanqi,

主耶稣, 主基督, 做我救恩聖杯: 主耶稣, 主基督, 世界和平聖餅.
Zhu Yesu, Zhu Jidu, zuo wo jiu en sheng bei: Zhu Yesu, Zhu Jidu, shijie heping sheng bing.
